name: Plunk
tagline: AI-driven home value tracking and renovation ROI analysis
description: Plunk uses AI to provide real-time home valuations and predict the ROI of specific renovations. Homeowners and agents can see how improvements like kitchen remodels or ADU additions would impact property value. Plunk analyzes millions of data points including permits, sales, and neighborhood trends to deliver accurate, continuously updated valuations.
cons: Coverage limited to certain US markets
